name: Appel à manifestation d'intérêt " Efficacité énergétique dans le logement social"
description: L'appel à manifestation d'intérêt vise à améliorer l'efficacité énergétique des logements sociaux en Nouvelle-Aquitaine, en offrant un financement du FEDER pour les projets pertinents. L'objectif est d'identifier les projets les plus adaptés et de mesurer l'investissement des porteurs de projet dans toute la région. Les projets éligibles comprennent les travaux d'efficacité énergétique, les équipements de production d'énergie renouvelable, les frais d'études et d'assistance à maîtrise d'ouvrage, les coûts de certification, les coûts d'accompagnement et les coûts d'instrumentation. Les bénéficiaires peuvent être des bailleurs sociaux publics ou privés, ainsi que d'autres propriétaires publics ou privés de logements sociaux.
requirements:
- The project aims to improve the energy efficiency of social housing in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.
- Projects should be eligible for funding from the European Regional Development Fund (FEDER) during the 2021-2027 programming period.
- The project seeks to identify the most relevant projects for energy efficiency in social housing.
- The goal is to measure the level of investment of project proponents across the region and identify their needs to better adapt regional responses.
- Eligible projects include energy efficiency works, renewable energy production equipment, studies and assistance, certification and labeling costs, and instrumentation for energy or water consumption monitoring.
- Project proponents can be public or private social housing landlords or other public or private owners of social housing.
- Applicants must have previously responded to the Call for Expression of Interest in 2022, but their application was considered incomplete.
- Additional documents are required to complete the application process.

name: Plan de Modernisation des Elevages
description: L'appel à projets FEADER "Plan de Modernisation des Elevages" vise à soutenir la modernisation des élevages néo-aquitains. Les objectifs du plan sont d'améliorer la compétitivité des élevages en soutenant des projets de construction, d'aménagement et d'équipement des structures. Les actions éligibles incluent la construction, l'extension et la rénovation de bâtiments d'élevage, ainsi que l'aménagement des abords, des équipements et des conditions de travail pour les animaux et les éleveurs. Les agriculteurs actifs sous forme de personne physique, personne morale sociétaire ou association peuvent soumettre leur demande. Le dépôt de dossier peut être effectué en téléchargeant les formulaires disponibles sur le site.
requirements:
- The project aims to support the modernization of livestock farming in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.
- The objective is to enhance the competitiveness of livestock farms through construction, renovation, and equipment projects.
- Eligible actions include the construction and renovation of livestock buildings, as well as the installation of equipment and facilities related to animal health and welfare.
- The project also includes improvements in energy efficiency, as well as the storage and treatment of livestock waste.
- The target beneficiaries are active farmers operating as individuals, corporations, or associations.
- Additional documents, such as self-assessment forms and diagnostic notices, may be required for project submission.

name: Appel à manifestation d'intérêts Interreg "Europe du Sud-Ouest (SUDOE)"
description: La préfecture de la Région Occitanie lance un appel à manifestation d'intérêts pour le programme Interreg "Europe du Sud-Ouest (SUDOE)". Ce programme vise à favoriser la coopération transnationale dans le Sud-Ouest européen, en particulier entre les régions françaises, espagnoles et portugaises. L'autorité nationale du programme apporte une aide technique et un accompagnement personnalisé aux structures souhaitant déposer une initiative répondant à cet appel à projets. Les propositions de projets éligibles doivent impliquer au moins un chef de file et un partenaire français provenant de deux des trois régions concernées. Les projets doivent présenter un caractère de coopération transnationale avéré dans un domaine couvert par les priorités du programme. Les structures publiques ou privées à but non lucratif situées dans les régions éligibles peuvent porter les projets. Pour plus d'informations, il est possible de télécharger le contenu de l'appel à manifestation d'intérêts et de contacter l'interlocuteur local.
requirements:
- The project must be a transnational cooperation project within the Southwestern European regions.
- The project must include at least one lead partner and one French partner from two of the eligible regions.
- The lead partner must have the administrative capacity to fulfill their role.
- The project must be proposed by a public or private non-profit structure located in a French region of the Southwestern European cooperation area.
- The project must demonstrate a clear transnational cooperation aspect in a priority area of the second call for projects of the SUDOE operational program 2021-2027.

name: Investissements agricoles collectifs
description: L'appel à projets FEADER "Investissements agricoles collectifs" vise à soutenir les collectifs d'agriculteurs dans l'achat de matériels performants répondant aux enjeux environnementaux, économiques et sociaux du monde agricole. Les projets collectifs qui seront prioritairement ciblés sont ceux liés à l'installation de nouveaux agriculteurs, à l'amélioration des conditions de travail sur les exploitations agricoles, à la modernisation des ateliers (élevages et productions végétales), à la suppression, la réduction ou l'optimisation des intrants (pesticides, nitrates, eau...), à l'adaptation et l'atténuation du changement climatique, à la réduction de l'impact des activités sur l'environnement, à la diversification, la réorientation ou la reconversion d'activités sur les exploitations agricoles, ainsi qu'à la démarche d'innovation en lien avec la transition agroécologique. Les porteurs de projets éligibles sont les CUMA (Coopératives d’Utilisation du Matériel Agricole) de Nouvelle-Aquitaine.
requirements:
- The project aims to support collective agricultural investments.
- The focus is on projects that address environmental, economic, and social challenges in the agricultural sector.
- The project prioritizes the installation of new farmers, improving working conditions on farms, modernizing workshops, reducing inputs, adapting to climate change, promoting agroecology and economic resilience, and fostering innovation.
- The eligible actions include the purchase of agricultural equipment and machinery.
- The beneficiaries of the project are CUMA (Cooperative for the Use of Agricultural Machinery) in Nouvelle-Aquitaine.
- The project provides funding for specific types of equipment listed in the call for projects.

name: Investissements pastoraux : contention des troupeaux et voirie pastorale
description: L'appel à projets vise à accompagner les agriculteurs pratiquant l'activité pastorale en estive. Il soutient l'acquisition d'équipements de contention des troupeaux ainsi que la réalisation de travaux de voirie pastorale adaptés aux équipements collectifs. Les objectifs sont d'aménager les espaces pastoraux, de sécuriser l'accès aux estives et de favoriser le travail des bergers. Les porteurs de projets peuvent être des collectivités gestionnaires d'estives, des associations foncières pastorales, des groupements pastoraux ou des associations agricoles à vocation pastorale. Les dossiers doivent être déposés après une pré-demande papier.
requirements:
- The project aims to support farmers practicing pastoral activity in summer grazing areas.
- The project will support the acquisition of livestock containment equipment and the construction of pastoral roads suitable for collective equipment.
- The project aims to improve the work of shepherds in summer grazing areas.
- The investments will focus on improving pastoral roads and access to grazing areas, as well as the construction of containment, sorting, and animal care equipment.
- The project is open to various beneficiaries including farmers, associations, and public structures.
- The project requires the submission of a paper pre-application before the dossier can be considered for evaluation.
- The project is supported by the Regional Council of Nouvelle-Aquitaine and the European Union.

name: Investissements pastoraux : cabanes et adductions d'eau
description: The project is called "Investissements pastoraux: cabanes et adductions d'eau" and it is supported by the Nouvelle-Aquitaine Region and Europe. The aim of the project is to support agricultural activity in mountain areas by financing collective pastoral equipment, specifically focusing on housing for shepherds and equipment related to dairy and cheese production. The eligible actions include the creation, modernization, and equipment of pastoral huts, as well as facilities for water treatment and supply. The project is open to various beneficiaries such as local authorities, pastoral management organizations, and agricultural associations. The deadline for project submission is September 15, 2023.
requirements:
- The project aims to support agricultural activity in mountainous areas by funding collective pastoral equipment in pastures, specifically for the housing of shepherds and equipment related to milk and cheese production.
- The call for projects is open from May 11, 2023, to September 15, 2023.
- The eligible actions include the creation, modernization, and equipment of pastoral huts, as well as fixed or mobile facilities and equipment for milk and cheese production.
- The project is open to various beneficiaries, including managed pasture and collective grazing managers, pastoral land associations, pastoral groups, and agricultural and pastoral associations.
- Only projects that have submitted a paper pre-application will be considered.
- The contact for the project is the Service pastoralisme montagne.
- The project is supported by the European Union.

name: Appel à projets FEADER "Prévention des risques pour les forêts"
description: The project aims to support forest managers in the prevention of risks in forest areas. It involves creating permanent prevention structures and upgrading existing infrastructure. The project is open to private forest owners, public entities, and organizations involved in forest management. The call for projects is open from February 27, 2023, to November 15, 2023.
requirements:
- The project aims to support forest managers in the prevention of various risks.
- The actions eligible for funding include creating permanent prevention structures for forest fire defense and upgrading existing structures and equipment.
- The project is open to private forest owners and their associations, public entities and their groupings, and the National Forestry Office for state forests.
- Additional documents required for application include a budget estimate, environmental aspects appendix, and a form related to public procurement.
- The project is funded by the European Union and the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.

name: "Desserte de forêt"
description: The project aims to improve the exploitation of forest areas in Nouvelle-Aquitaine by enhancing forest access and infrastructure. It is supported by the European Union and the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region. The eligible actions include creating or upgrading forest infrastructure, such as roads and equipment, with a focus on immediate timber mobilization. The project is open to individuals or entities with rights to forests or the relevant land. The application process involves submitting the required documents through the online platform.
requirements:
- Improve forest accessibility and forest management
- Create or upgrade infrastructure for forest transportation
- Work on internal forest roads to facilitate timber mobilization
- Address road congestion issues on communal, rural, or private roads
- Incorporate landscape integration and ecological engineering
- Conduct network searches or displacement if necessary
- Applicants must have rights over the forests or the land where the actions will take place
- Public entities and their associations without property rights may also apply
- Submit the application online
- Provide a budget and impact assessment
- Include information on environmental and landscape aspects
- Declare if subject to public procurement regulations
- Contact the FEADER (forest) department for more information
